name: CollectiblesAndChill
description:
This is a simple puzzle survival game.
Read the help for more specialized enemies but for movement:
>Click the boot and a tile within 'sight' to move towards it. If it's outside the range it will move towards it over multiple turns.

>Press next turn to go to the next turn

>Press the staff to see abilities and show the exit button. 

>Attack collectibles to 'collect' them and win the game.
